title: installer won't work
body: {{champion:145}} When I recently switched computers and tried to install League of legends I got an error file structure not found code (-0.10 (and some more i don't remember)) and it would refuse to run. I have tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it. disabling firewalls and other such things and running as administrator. (and a combination of all the above) please help this is frustrating.

replies.body:
Full system specs: hardware, storage drives used, operating system version, antivirus?

It could be almost anything, cant even guess with no info.
